name: The Circular Saw
shortDescription: A good circular saw is one of the most versatile tools you can own. Most people consider the circular saw to be a carpentry tool

name: The Random Orbital Sander
shortDescription: A random orbital sander is actually a step up from the “little brother” version – the palm sander. The random orbital sander uses hook and loop (Velcro)

name: The Circular Saw
shortDescription: A good palm sander is vital to any woodworker’s power tool collection. The palm sander will use ¼ of a sheet of sanding paper and is small

name: The Sabre Saw
shortDescription: Every woodworker should have a saber saw. Often called a jigsaw, it will allow you to cut curves and patterns in your stock materials

name: The Circular Saw
shortDescription: A good circular saw is one of the most versatile tools you can own. Most people consider the circular saw to be a carpentry tool

name: The Compound Miter Saw
shortDescription: You already have a tenon saw with a miter box, but if you’re going to get into the crown molding and other such projects, you’ll need a compound miter saw.
